phrs.translation: 同意, 顺水人情, 应允, 就任
答应, 同意, 就任

sentences.sentence: I never understood why he didn't just accede to our demands at the outset.
sentences.translation: 我从不能理解为什么他不一开始就答应我们的请求。

sentences.sentence: Her drive to stay consistent will prompt her to accede to your request and bring a main dish.
sentences.translation: 她保持一致的趋向将会促使她同意你的请求，并且带来一份主菜。

sentences.sentence: At present, a male royal heir would always accede to the throne ahead of an older sister.
sentences.translation: 目前，男性王室成员相对于他的姐姐拥有对王位的优先继承权。
